name: suggest chapter
content: ({ start: function(...args) { this.prompt = `Please suggest a chapter based on the following idea: "${args[0]}". The answer should have the following structure: { "title": "A fitting chapter title for the content", , "visibility": "show", "paragraphs": [ { "text": "Text for this paragraph", ", "mainIdea": "The main idea for this paragraph", "alternativeParagraphs": [] }, ...additional paragraphs in similar format... ], "alternativeChapters": [], "mainIdeas": ["Main idea 1 for the chapter", ...additional main ideas...] }`; this.setDefaultValues(); this.setIntelligenceLevel(3); this.execute(); }, execute: async function() { let altChapter = await this.brainstorm(this.prompt, 1); try { JSON.parse(altChapter); } catch (e) { this.fail(e); } this.return(altChapter); } })
description: suggests a chapter alternative based on the current chapter
